name: Ingmar Bergman
spouse: Else Fisher (1943–1945) ,  Ellen Lundström (1945-1950) ,  Gun Grut (1951–1959) ,  Käbi Laretei (1959–1969) ,  Ingrid von Rosen (1971–1995)
children: Lena Bergman (b. 1943) ,  Eva Bergman (b. 1945) ,  Jan Bergman (b. 1946) ,  Mats Bergman (b. 1948) ,  Anna Bergman (b. 1948) ,  Ingmar Bergman Jr. (b. 1951) ,  Maria von Rosen (b. 1959) , Daniel Bergman (b. 1962) ,  Linn Ullmann (b. 1966)
academyawards: '''Irving G. Thalberg Memorial Award''' ,  1971 Lifetime Achievement
awards: '''NYFCC Award for Best Director''' ,  1973 ''Viskningar och rop'' ,  1974 ''Scener ur ett äktenskap'' ,  1983 ''Fanny och Alexander'' ,  '''NYFCC Award for Best Screenplay''' ,  1973 ''Viskningar och rop''
